normalized: dadaa!
asagi ran through the hallway of the official residence without stopping.
a number of gunshots were audible.
there were also sounds like people being hit, and thrown against something.
and successive screams of death agony.
they were unmistakably being attacked.

name: asagi
normalized: crap!
shouting involuntarily, asagi rushed into the office.
the state of the room burst into her field of vision.
it was a dreadful situation.
the large window of super-reinforced glass was completely destroyed.
it seemed the assailant had gotten in from there.
even the sofa that asagi had been sitting in a little while ago was blown in half.
mixing with the wreckage, the security police guarding the prime minister were all scattered around the floor.
those whose necks had been broken, those whose torsos had been cut in half, those whose limbs had been sliced off.
they were all dead.
there were even those who had been thrown onto the wall, and were clinging to it like lumps of meat.
it was an extremely cruel manner of killing.
however, asai and nonomura were still safe.
the figures of the two were seen hiding themselves under the bulletproof office desk placed alongside the wall.
there were only two security police protecting them now.
they were standing in front of the office desk, guns readied.
the points of their guns were focused on a single girl.
that was the assailant.
asagi had read that much information in an instant.
and then――

name: asagi
normalized: asuka…?!
she recognized the girl's appearance from behind.
no, she wasn't able to forget.
the precious family member asagi had kept searching for.
above all, they had had a chance meeting in tokyo kingdom just a few days ago.
asuka looked back at asagi, who had unintentionally let out her voice.
surprise was suspended on her face.
the two security police continually fired their guns.
it was a good decision to have exploited a weakness in the assailant.

name: asuka
normalized: hah…!
however, faster than the gunshots resounded, asuka was fluttering in the air.
two people's worth of bullets fruitlessly passed through a space where nobody was.

name: asuka
normalized: ＜android leg＞ “spiral kick”!
asuka, who had danced around the gunfire, turned around and delivered kicks to the two security police consecutively.
the security police couldn't keep up at all with that movement, which far surpassed a normal person's.
probably without even knowing what had happened, they received flying kicks.
their bodies bent in a く shape, the pits of their stomachs completely caved in.
it was an almost instant death.
asuka's attack was without hesitation.
however, asagi did not hesitate either.
she could not afford to let her kill the prime minister.

name: asagi
normalized: haa!
asagi transformed into the appearance of a taimanin in an instant, and slashed at asuka.

name: asuka
normalized: kuhh!
giinn!
asuka turned around and repelled asagi's slash attack.
a blade extended from her mechanical arm.

name: asagi
normalized: asuka!
using the momentum of her sword being repelled, asagi unleashed a blow that resembled scooping from the opposite direction.

name: asuka
normalized: why are you here?!
giinn!
asuka defended that by striking low diagonally.
furthermore, she thrust her blade back instantly.
fast.

name: asagi
normalized: that's my line!
gyaiinn!
this time, asagi repelled it.

name: asuka
normalized: kuhh!

name: asagi
normalized: asuka, what's the meaning of this?!
a strike from above her head.
it had power, but the space of time she had to dodge was also great.
normally, asagi never performed such a crude attack.
however, asagi was enraged by asuka, who had massacred the security police.

name: asuka
normalized: i have nothing to say to you!
asuka did not try to escape.
holding her ground, she also swung downwards from above her head, and caught asagi's blow head-on.
gyaannh!

name: asagi
normalized: kuhh!

name: asuka
normalized: guuh!
both people's blades linked together, giving off sparks.

name: asagi
normalized: haah!
while pushing her sword forward, asagi scowled at asuka.

name: asuka
normalized: haahh!
like the blow from just before, asuka caught it head on.
the pair's faces were not even 30 cm apart.
eyes of intense anger were pointed at asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: won't talk?!
then i'll hear you by force!

name: asuka
normalized: if you can!
asuka barked.
her mechanical arm made a hum.

name: asagi
normalized: kuhh!
tremendous strength.
far surpassing a human.
it was on the level of an oni of hell.

name: asuka
normalized: i can't go easy on you!
the plan was to cut her down by brute force.
she probably had mechanized superhuman strength as well.
however, her opponent was asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: naive.
――gently…

name: asuka
normalized: wha?!
just before she lost the pushing contest, asagi dodged with exquisite timing and parried asuka's strength.
she had made her enemy's strength her own strength, and cleverly turned the direction of the blade away.
a masterful “dodge” of asagi's level would almost certainly throw off her readiness.
if she were then slashed at, it would be over.

name: asuka
normalized: kuh!
asuka stumbled forward due to the movement of asagi, whose soft method got the better of brute force.

name: asagi
normalized: hahh!
asagi lowered her upper body and swept her sword sideways.
she was trying to stop her legs without killing her.
however, asuka's movement forward from there surpassed asagi's expectations.

name: asuka
normalized: tch!

name: asagi
normalized: wha?!
gyururuu!
her mechanized limbs displayed strange movements that were impossible for a human.
asuka's limbs moved like a robot deployed in space activating its manipulator arms to control its posture in zero gravity.
her collapsed balance was forcibly restored, and her body leapt upwards.
bunn!
asagi's sword just fruitlessly sliced through the empty space.
asuka dodged asagi's sword with literal machine precision.
furthermore, it was not limited to just dodging.

name: asuka
normalized: yaahh!
asuka, who had leapt, pressed against the ceiling with both hands.
accelerating the momentum of springing up even further, she fired a roundhouse kick toward asagi.
built-in blades protruded from both legs.

name: asuka
normalized: ＜android leg＞ “spiral slash”!
asuka's drilling kick.
the blades of both legs buzzed like the blades of a mixer, and approached asagi.
if she received something like that, she would be turned to mincemeat.

name: asagi
normalized: kuhh!
asagi promptly kicked off the floor.
using the momentum of striking and missing with her sword, she made a huge jump out of the way, to the right.
zsaah!
a hair's breadth.
no, the hair that had remained in the air behind asagi ended up being cut into countless pieces.

name: asuka
normalized: just as i'd expect!
asuka expressed a daring smile.
she instantly stopped the intense spinning and turned around to face asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: you too.
though her spine noisily shivered, asagi also promptly reorganized her posture.
mechanized power and speed.
movement that didn't seem like a human's at all.
and yet, adaptation to the circumstances that could not be compared with a battle robot.
most of all, the secret battle techniques of the koukawa house were being enhanced to a degree that rivalled asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: （this girl, looks like she's completely making those mechanical limbs her own.
she's strong!
asagi stared at asuka across her readied sword.
her figure extended blades from both arms and legs.
it gave the impression that her whole body was a weapon.
she had fired missiles from those arms in tokyo kingdom.
it wasn't clear what she would do.
it was certain that asuka's own “wind god arts” were being enhanced by machine power.
she was, beyond doubt, a formidable enemy.

name: asagi
normalized: （what should i do?
use ninja arts?
but――）
ninja art・light battle blossom.
asagi's deadly sword would inflict a high-speed slash with such velocity that time would appear to have stopped.

but, for that reason, it was too powerful.
the user of all that couldn't go easy on their opponent when using their ninja art, even if they were asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: （i might kill asuka.

asuka was family.

indecision as a parent.

normalized: not fighting seriously, huh…?

she intended to escape.

name: asagi
normalized: wait, asuka!

in a voice not of a taimanin, but a parent.

normalized: asuka…
those eyes.

normalized: y, you've done well… ya, yamamoto-kun… uuh…

thank you.

normalized: wh, who was that just now?!

name: yamamoto
normalized: asagi, who was that just now?
do you know her?
